Erick Thohir Kantongi Nama Dirut BTN: Tunggu Akhir Bulan
05 Nov 2019, 08:50 by Dias Prasongko, Dewi Rina Cahyani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara atau BUMN Erick Thohir mengatakan dirinya telah mengantongi nama Direktur Utama PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk yang baru. Kendati demikian, dia enggan menjelaskan siapa sosok direktur utama yang baru tersebut.
Selain itu, Erick Thohir meminta untuk menunggu keluarnya keputusan lewat pengumuman dalam Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa (RUPSLB) BTN. Rencananya, RUSPLB tersebut akan digelar pada akhir bulan November.
"Pasti ada langkah-langkah hebat. Akhir bulan masih dalam proses untuk ditinjau juga, tapi direktur utamanya sudah ada," kata Erick Thohir saat ditemui di kantor Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Adapun saat ini posisi Direktur Utama Bank Tabungan Negara mengalami kekosongan. Kursi direktur utama kini diisi oleh pelaksana tugas harian (Plh) Oni Febrianto, yang sebelumnya menjabat sebagai Direktur Commercial and Banking Bank Tabungan Negara.
Keputusan penunjukkan Oni dilakukan usai mengelar RUPSLB pada Kamis, 29 Agustus 2019. Keputusan itu, diambil dan disepakati bersama-sama dengan seluruh jajaran direksi Bank Tabungan Negara.
Adapun, kekosongan posisi Direktur Utama BTN terjadi usai mantan Direktur Utama PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk. Suprajarto menolak keputusan RUPSLB BTN. Suprajarto seharusnya mengisi posisi tersebut menggantikan Maryono sebagai direktur utama sebelumnya.

Erick Thohir Kantongi Name of Director of BTN: Wait for the End of the Month
05 Nov 2019, 08:50 by Dias Prasongko, Dewi Rina Cahyani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir said he has pocketed the name of the new President Director of PT Bank Tabungan Negara (Persero) Tbk. Nevertheless, he was reluctant to explain who the new president director was.
In addition, Erick Thohir asked to wait for the decision to be issued through an announcement at the BTN Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (EGMS). The plan, the RUSPLB will be held at the end of November.
"There must be great steps. The end of the month is still in the process of being reviewed as well, but the managing director is already there," Erick Thohir said when met at the Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs, Central Jakarta, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
Now the position of President Director of the National Savings Bank is experiencing a vacancy. The chair of the president director is now filled by the executor of daily duties (Plh) Oni Febrianto, who previously served as Director of Commercial and Banking of the State Savings Bank.
The decision to appoint Oni was made after the convening of the EGMS on Thursday, August 29, 2019. That decision was taken and agreed upon with the entire board of directors of the State Savings Bank.
Meanwhile, the vacancy of the position of President Director of BTN occurred after the former President Director of PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia (Persero) Tbk. Suprajarto rejected the BTN RUPSLB decision. Suprajarto should fill this position replacing Maryono as the previous president director.
